acf.title: Global Head of Commodities
acf.bio_copy:
Anthony Dewell is Global Head of Commodities at Millennium. He is responsible for daily oversight and management of the firm’s commodities portfolio managers.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2023, Anthony spent over 15 years at Goldman Sachs in the commodities business. He held many different trading roles within the organization, working and gaining experience in a range of different commodities. Most recently, Anthony served as a Partner and EMEA Head of Commodities, Global Head of Index Trading and Co-Head of Oil Trading. In these roles, he held responsibilities for multiple trading teams at the bank.

Anthony received an MA in Mathematics and Statistics from Oxford University and a Master’s in Mathematics of Finance from Columbia University.
acf.subtitle: Trading Management
